title: Not Fantastic Not Horrible
review: Movies based on historical events are my favorite.I understand that 'liberties' are usually taken for continuity reasons, and for the most part, I accept it.However, they created Neil to be some kind of (for lack of a better term) idiot savant.Withdrawn, aloof, out of touch and extremely cold to his friends and family.I have not studied Armstrong in heavy detail but the few things I have read did not seem to depict him this way.Claire Foy was superb as ususl.
